name: notebooklm-clone
description: NotebookLM clone with PDF processing and AI chat

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build --if-present || echo 'Frontend build skipped'
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:frontend || echo 'Frontend build failed, continuing with backend only'
